extendedInfo.description: **ATTENTION** Installation problems?  Please read below.What is a doo-dad?  A doo-dad is a widget that sole purpose is to add a little bling to your screen without having to change your background or theme.  Do you have the perfect wallpaper or theme but it is missing some little something to set it off?  That's where doo-dads come in.  Doo-dads come in various sizes and put very little drain on your battery.To Install:1. Purchase, download and install2. Go to blank area on home screen and long hold (press and hold)3. When menu comes up select Widgets4. Look for the doo-dad you installed and select itYour doo-dad should appear on the screen.  If you would like to move it around just press and long hold until you see the doo-dad increase in size then move it to where you want it.Everybody's screen needs a doo-dad!Enjoy!keywords: tribal, heart, doo-dads, doodads, dodads, decoration, graffiti, graphics, awesome, art, sticker, decal, eye candy, personalization, dml, dark matter lab

reviews.title: Why?
reviews.comment: After buying one of your stickers and being misled into thinking it came in several colors, which it doesn\'t, I noticed you charge for most of your stickers. They do nothing and most wallpapers cost less then what you charge. I bet you don\'t get many buyers... What a rip off! I could understand charging $1 if they came with more designs, colors, but to get just one!? Insane! Most phones can change the size manually to. I want to know why you change so much for these? To can\'t apply, these are widgets.
reviews.author: patricia bills
